item.title: WebRTC in 5 Minutes
item.description: While WebRTC has been around for awhile now but its still feels like a young technology and there are few resources to learn about it. These are the basics of how a connection is made between peers which is important for understanding how WebRTC differs from traditional networking. Creating a Connection __Fetch ICE (Interactive Connectivity Establishment) Candidates from STUN server.__ Contains details of how the data is going to be exchanged (ip, port, protocol).
